actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT e.id,
			 e."title",
			 e.title_en,
			 e.created_at,
			 e.updated_at,
			 e.equipment_id,
			 e.type_id,
			 array(select em.muscle_group_id from exercise_muscle_group em where em.exercise_id = e.id) as muscle_group_id,
		     e.image_url,
			 e.custom
FROM exercise e
where concat(e.title,';',e.title_en) ilike '%' || coalesce({{this.params.searchTerm}},'') || '%'
ORDER BY e.id asc;
